definition: Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]

sentences.english: Will the Lakers three-peat, or will they fall short?
sentences.chinese: 湖人是會三連冠，還是會功虧一簣？

sentences.english: How strong is the Lakers' home-court advantage?
sentences.chinese: 湖人有多大的主場優勢？

sentences.english: James comes armed for the Lakers now.
sentences.chinese: 現在詹姆斯有了左膀右臂來對抗湖人。

sentences.english: How are Lakers fans supposed to interpret these comments?
sentences.chinese: 湖人球迷應當這麼解讀加索爾的表態呢？

sentences.english: This is the Lakers' first four-day break of the season.
sentences.chinese: 這是湖人這個賽季第一次有連續4天沒有比賽。

sentences.english: Ron Artest quickly signed with the Lakers.
sentences.chinese: 阿泰斯特很快就與湖人簽約。

sentences.english: Friday's second lesson is that these Lakers are indeed becoming coldblooded enough to take advantage of it.
sentences.chinese: 第二個結論是這隻湖人在打擊對手方面非常冷血。

sentences.english: The Lakers only wanted it this year.
sentences.chinese: 湖人今年只是想贏得冠軍。

sentences.english: The Lakers have former MVP Kobe Bryant pairing with Fisher in their starting back-court.
sentences.chinese: 湖人的後衛陣容有前MVP科比和費舍爾的配對。

sentences.english: The other consistent theme for the Lakers for the evening was turnovers.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上對湖人來說另一個一貫的主題是人員調整。

sentences.english: This time, though, the Lakers will be without their second-leading scorer and rebounder .
sentences.chinese: 可是這次湖人缺少了他們的二號得分手和籃板手。

sentences.english: A. But no matter. The Lakers were relevant once again.
sentences.chinese: 但是無論如何，湖人又一次成爲聚焦點。

sentences.english: The Lakers and Levy, this was a match made in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 湖人和利維，真的是天作之合。

sentences.english: The Lakers are not going to trade him to another team in the West.
sentences.chinese: 湖人是不會將他交易到任何一支在西部的球隊的。

sentences.english: The Lakers have five regular-season games left before playoffs begin.
sentences.chinese: 湖人距離季後賽開始還有五場比賽。

sentences.english: Third, he is more concerned about his music (which isn't very good) than basketball, this will only hinder the Lakers.
sentences.chinese: 比起籃球，他更愛音樂，這會阻礙湖人進步。

definition: Kobe Bryant/abbr. for 科比·布萊恩特|科比·布莱恩特[Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4]
horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
